div.p: Relative yield changes of millet (o) and sorghum (+) simulated by SARRA-H in 2000–2009 relative to a counterfactual climate condition and relative changes of rainfall (left) and absolute change of mean surface temperature (right). All values are shown on average across West Africa (20°W to 15°E; 4°N to 18°N) for each of the 100 members of the ensemble simulation.
